meta.description: Optimize the number of patients whose blood pressure can be taken using automatic and manual machines.

sets.name: MACHINES
sets.description: Types of machines used for taking blood pressure.

params.name: time_per_patient
params.description: Time in minutes required per patient for each machine type.

params.name: clinic_open_time
params.description: Total time in minutes the clinic is open.

vars.name: patients
vars.description: Number of patients processed by each machine type.

objective.name: max_patients
objective.description: Maximize the total number of patients whose blood pressure can be taken.

constraints.name: time_constraint_automatic
constraints.description: Time constraint for the automatic machine.

constraints.name: time_constraint_manual
constraints.description: Time constraint for the manual machine.

constraints.name: manual_vs_automatic
constraints.description: At least twice as many patients must be processed by the manual machine than the automatic machine.

constraints.name: minimum_automatic_patients
constraints.description: At least 20 patients must be processed by the automatic machine.
